text: STOCKHOLM, March 12 Sweden, which has shunned lockdowns throughout the pandemic, registered 5,335 new coronavirus cases on Friday, health agency statistics showed.The country of 10 million inhabitants registered 35 new deaths, taking the total to 13,146. The deaths registered have occurred over several days and sometimes weeks.Swedens death rate per capita is many times higher than that of its Nordic neighbours but lower than in several European countries that opted for lockdowns. (Reporting by Johan Ahlander; editing by Niklas Pollard)
